channel.title: [Delta] AncientBlitz 317 | Bring back old school servers!
channel.description:
[center][size=18pt]AncientBlitz 317 | Bring back old school servers![/size][/center]
I've been working on a Delta base the past couple of weeks, and decided that it was too much work to finish this off. I have programmed a new GUI Panel, to help make it easier to control the server, especially when their are spammers that have shit tons of spaces in their names. This Delta base has been edited a lot, and has some new items to make some people like it, but it also has the old school feeling, because ofcourse its a delta! Its some what of a stable base, I have never experienced any errors while running it, and I have patched almost all the dupes. Your welcome to download it and try it out, it has a shit ton of features many just have not been implement yet, because I cba. I will shut up now and let you see some pictures.
[center]Features: -13 fully working quests! (With rewards) -21 fully working skills! -Custom minigames! -All godwars bosses! -Many areas to explore! -Defender emote! -Balanced XP rate! -Construction! -Member skillarea! -X-log disabled! -Pest control! -Fight pits! -Duel arena! -77+ commands! -Event server manager! -Sounds! -90% Godsword animations + specials! -Godsword special effects! -Funpk! -Custom interfaces! -'Attack' option in wildy only! -Great stability! -Vegeance emotes! -474 Whip emotes! -Stable -TWO iPanels! -Gadgets from ZombieSuite installed! -ConnectionFilter! [/center]
[center]Media
[IMG]http://i38.tinypic.com/hs6ixv.gif[/img][IMG]http://i34.tinypic.com/14cz24x.gif[/img][IMG]http://i34.tinypic.com/6zoiuo.gif[/img][img]http://img29.imageshack.us/img29/6131/veng.gif[/img][IMG]http://i38.tinypic.com/2irkd4o.jpg[/img][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/dnJTE.png[/img][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/OKxzW.png[/img][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/UdZoY.png[/img][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/plxVX.png[/img]
[/center]
[center]Link[/center] Package: http://www.mediafire.com/?1mdb4da60uzswd2
Credits: - Aintario - 75% (Dragon-History V1) - Me - 25%
Also - I didn't post pictures of a lot of features, there is much more this server has to offer. If your looking for a Delta base, I highly recommend this base. I've been using it for a couple of weeks, and it didn't let me down. But if your looking for a PvP server, this isn't for you. This is just a overall fun server to play. :)

item.title: [Delta] AncientBlitz 317 | Bring back old school servers!
item.dc:creator: @iCharizard iCharizard
item.description:
@iCharizard wrote:

I liked Dragon History, but I don’t like this. There’s not much point to giving out criticism because you’ve given up on it. But I’m surely positive you didn’t ‘program’ that GUI, so I think you should put credits where due. Good effort and such.

Read full topic

I only kept it because most Delta’s used to have, and honestly brings back some memories.

item.title: [Delta] AncientBlitz 317 | Bring back old school servers!
item.dc:creator: @kill_you704 kill you704
item.description:
@kill_you704 wrote:

[center][size=18pt]AncientBlitz 317 | Bring back old school servers![/size][/center]

I’ve been working on a Delta base the past couple of weeks, and decided that it was too much work to finish this off. I have programmed a new GUI Panel, to help make it easier to control the server, especially when their are spammers that have shit tons of spaces in their names. This Delta base has been edited a lot, and has some new items to make some people like it, but it also has the old school feeling, because ofcourse its a delta! Its some what of a stable base, I have never experienced any errors while running it, and I have patched almost all the dupes. Your welcome to download it and try it out, it has a shit ton of features many just have not been implement yet, because I cba. I will shut up now and let you see some pictures.

[center]Features:
-13 fully working quests! (With rewards)
-21 fully working skills!
-Custom minigames!
-All godwars bosses!
-Many areas to explore!
-Defender emote!
-Balanced XP rate!
-Construction!
-Member skillarea!
-X-log disabled!
-Pest control!
-Fight pits!
-Duel arena!
-77+ commands!
-Event server manager!
-Sounds!
-90% Godsword animations + specials!
-Godsword special effects!
-Funpk!
-Custom interfaces!
-‘Attack’ option in wildy only!
-Great stability!
-Vegeance emotes!
-474 Whip emotes!
-Stable
-TWO iPanels!
-Gadgets from ZombieSuite installed!
-ConnectionFilter!
[/center]

Also - I didn’t post pictures of a lot of features, there is much more this server has to offer. If your looking for a Delta base, I highly recommend this base. I’ve been using it for a couple of weeks, and it didn’t let me down. But if your looking for a PvP server, this isn’t for you. This is just a overall fun server to play.
